info.name: Twitch - Google Colab Kitty Style
info.description:
Love Google Colab's Kitty mode? Use Twitch? Now you can bring Google Colab's kitty to Twitch - a walking kitty!
Make sure to select which Halloween kitty you'd like under the options above!
info.additionalInfo: Make sure to select which Halloween kitty you'd like under the options above!
